engChrName: I don't think anyone drives as good as you, Risette.
engSearchText: I don't think anyone drives as good as you, Risette.
jpnChrName: うーん、リゼットさんの運転は まさに正確無比って感じですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、リゼットさんの運転は
まさに正確無比って感じですねっ。

engChrName: You know just how to make those little, subtle moves to work with the flow of traffic.
engSearchText:
You know just how to make those little, subtle moves
to work with the flow of traffic.
jpnChrName: さっきから必要最低限の動きで “流れ”を掴んでいる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
さっきから必要最低限の動きで
“流れ”を掴んでいる気がします。

engChrName: Yeah. Never seen anyone drive so straight.
engSearchText: Yeah. Never seen anyone drive so straight.
jpnChrName: ライン取りな、見事なモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ライン取りな、見事なモンだぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. Why, thank you very much.
engSearchText: Heehee. Why, thank you very much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、恐れ入ります。

engChrName: Of COURSE you've got an international license. What did I expect?
engSearchText:
Of COURSE you've got an international license.
What did I expect?
jpnChrName: ハッ、さすが国際免許なんて スカしたモン持ってるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、さすが国際免許なんて
スカしたモン持ってるじゃねえか。

engChrName: I know I'm a perfect five on the driving scale, but I don't mind leaving the work to a solid three like you. Better you than the two over here.
engSearchText:
I know I'm a perfect five on the driving scale, but I
don't mind leaving the work to a solid three like you.
Better you than the two over here.
jpnChrName: ま、俺が５だとしたらアンタには ３くらいは運転を任せてもいいぜ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺が５だとしたらアンタには
３くらいは運転を任せてもいいぜ？

engChrName: Yeah, she's pretty damn... Wait, am I the two?!
engSearchText: Yeah, she's pretty damn... Wait, am I the two?!
jpnChrName: ああ、そんくらいは…… ──って俺が２かよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そんくらいは……
──って俺が２かよ！？

engChrName: That's right, chief. Better get your act together.
engSearchText: That's right, chief. Better get your act together.
jpnChrName: 所長なんだからドンと構えとけって。
jpnSearchText: 所長なんだからドンと構えとけって。

engChrName: Don't you worry, though. You ever really wanna make her scream, I'm here.
engSearchText:
Don't you worry, though. You ever really wanna make
her scream, I'm here.
jpnChrName: ……ククク、ご自慢の愛車、 若いテクで存分に啼（な）かせてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
……ククク、ご自慢の愛車、
若いテクで存分に啼（な）かせてやるからよ。

engChrName: You rat bastard... Don't think you can satisfy my girl with how rough you handle—
engSearchText:
You rat bastard... Don't think you can satisfy my girl
with how rough you handle—
jpnChrName: て、てめぇ……力任せのテクで 俺の相棒を満足させられるとでも──
jpnSearchText:
て、てめぇ……力任せのテクで
俺の相棒を満足させられるとでも──

engChrName: Mr. Wei, Mr. Arkride. A child is present.
engSearchText: Mr. Wei, Mr. Arkride. A child is present.
jpnChrName: アーロン様、ヴァン様も フェリ様がいるのでそのくらいで。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン様、ヴァン様も
フェリ様がいるのでそのくらいで。

engChrName: (I wonder what Agnès is up to...)
engSearchText: (I wonder what Agnès is up to...)
jpnChrName: （そういえばアニエスさんは   今頃どのあたりかな……？）
jpnSearchText:
（そういえばアニエスさんは
今頃どのあたりかな……？）

engChrName: Your great-grandfather left that behind, yes?
engSearchText: Your great-grandfather left that behind, yes?
jpnChrName: ──曾お祖父さんの 遺したものだったかしら？
jpnSearchText:
──曾お祖父さんの
遺したものだったかしら？

engChrName: It must be very precious to you if you even brought it for our visitation.
engSearchText:
It must be very precious to you if you even brought it
for our visitation.
jpnChrName: 研修にも持ってくるなんて、 肌身離さずって感じね。
jpnSearchText:
研修にも持ってくるなんて、
肌身離さずって感じね。

engChrName: It is, yes.
engSearchText: It is, yes.
jpnChrName: 大切なものですから……
jpnSearchText: 大切なものですから……

engChrName: It's no exaggeration to say that I am who I am because of this.
engSearchText:
It's no exaggeration to say that I am who I am
because of this.
jpnChrName: これがあったから、今の私がいる…… そう言っても過言じゃありません。
jpnSearchText:
これがあったから、今の私がいる……
そう言っても過言じゃありません。

engChrName: Though recently, it's given me an awful lot to think about...
engSearchText:
Though recently, it's given me an awful lot to
think about...
jpnChrName: ……最近は考えさせられるような事も 多くなっちゃっていますけど……
jpnSearchText:
……最近は考えさせられるような事も
多くなっちゃっていますけど……

engChrName: Well, there's nothing wrong with that.
engSearchText: Well, there's nothing wrong with that.
jpnChrName: ……ま、いいんじゃない？
jpnSearchText: ……ま、いいんじゃない？

engChrName: It doesn't seem to me like you have any regrets about it, at least.
engSearchText:
It doesn't seem to me like you have any regrets
about it, at least.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも“後悔”だけは していないみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも“後悔”だけは
していないみたいだし。

engChrName: You're right. I don't.
engSearchText: You're right. I don't.
jpnChrName: ……はい。 それは間違いありません。
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
それは間違いありません。

engChrName: Someone told me that I make the calls on what I want to do with my life.
engSearchText:
Someone told me that I make the calls on what I
want to do with my life.
jpnChrName: “決めるのはお前だ”って 言ってくれた人もいますから。
jpnSearchText:
“決めるのはお前だ”って
言ってくれた人もいますから。

engChrName: Maybe I haven't made all the right ones, but even still, my world has truly broadened, and I've gotten to know so many wonderful people.
engSearchText:
Maybe I haven't made all the right ones, but even
still, my world has truly broadened, and I've gotten to
know so many wonderful people.
jpnChrName: ……悼ましいこともありましたが、 多くの繋がりを得て世界が広まりました。
jpnSearchText:
……悼ましいこともありましたが、
多くの繋がりを得て世界が広まりました。

engChrName: I've come to know the nation of my birth from angles I never thought possible.
engSearchText:
I've come to know the nation of my birth from angles
I never thought possible.
jpnChrName: 私を育んできたカルバードという国を 様々な角度から識ることもできて……
jpnSearchText:
私を育んできたカルバードという国を
様々な角度から識ることもできて……

engChrName: And thanks to that, I'm now beginning to see how I should face the man moving this country forward.
engSearchText:
And thanks to that, I'm now beginning to see how I
should face the man moving this country forward.
jpnChrName: 今、この国を動かしているあの人に どう向き合うか──少し見えてきました。
jpnSearchText:
今、この国を動かしているあの人に
どう向き合うか──少し見えてきました。

engChrName: ...Not even trying to hide it, are you?
engSearchText: ...Not even trying to hide it, are you?
jpnChrName: ……ふう、隠す気ないのかしら？
jpnSearchText: ……ふう、隠す気ないのかしら？

engChrName: Wasn't it supposed to be a secret to everyone but these two?
engSearchText:
Wasn't it supposed to be a secret to everyone but
these two?
jpnChrName: この子たちとだけの 秘密なんじゃなかったの？
jpnSearchText:
この子たちとだけの
秘密なんじゃなかったの？

engChrName: Ahaha... True. It was.
engSearchText: Ahaha... True. It was.
jpnChrName: あはは、そうですね。
jpnSearchText: あはは、そうですね。

engChrName: But I don't know—I get the feeling it's fine if you know, too.
engSearchText:
But I don't know—I get the feeling it's fine if you
know, too.
jpnChrName: でも──先輩にならって 不思議と思えてしまって。
jpnSearchText:
でも──先輩にならって
不思議と思えてしまって。

engChrName: Ever since meeting you in April, you've been so kind to me.
engSearchText:
Ever since meeting you in April, you've been so kind
to me.
jpnChrName: ４月に初めてお会いしたのに いつもいつも良くしてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
４月に初めてお会いしたのに
いつもいつも良くしてくれて……

engChrName: You're the one who connected me to Van, so—
engSearchText: You're the one who connected me to Van, so—
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんの所を訪ねるきっかけも いただきましたし──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんの所を訪ねるきっかけも
いただきましたし──

engChrName: Oh, I see now... You pushed me to use the orbal net specifically so I'd find his office, didn't you?
engSearchText:
Oh, I see now... You pushed me to use the orbal net
specifically so I'd find his office, didn't you?
jpnChrName: あ……それであの時、 導力ネットで事務所のことを？
jpnSearchText:
あ……それであの時、
導力ネットで事務所のことを？

engChrName: Heehee. Bingo.
engSearchText: Heehee. Bingo.
jpnChrName: クスクス、そういうこと。
jpnSearchText: クスクス、そういうこと。

engChrName: If it matters, we hadn't seen each other since we first met for a request five years ago.
engSearchText:
If it matters, we hadn't seen each other since we first
met for a request five years ago.
jpnChrName: ちなみに彼とは５年前に “依頼”で知り合ったきりでね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに彼とは５年前に
“依頼”で知り合ったきりでね。

engChrName: He wasn't even aware that I had come to Calvard as a foreign exchange student.
engSearchText:
He wasn't even aware that I had come to Calvard as a
foreign exchange student.
jpnChrName: 春に私が共和国に留学に来たことも 知らなかったくらいだから安心なさいな。
jpnSearchText:
春に私が共和国に留学に来たことも
知らなかったくらいだから安心なさいな。

engChrName: It doesn't matter, of course...but then why did you take his arm like that...?
engSearchText:
It doesn't matter, of course...but then why did you
take his arm like that...?
jpnChrName: べ、別に……でも、 それじゃあどうして腕を……
jpnSearchText:
べ、別に……でも、
それじゃあどうして腕を……

engChrName: To see your reaction. ❤
engSearchText: To see your reaction. ❤
jpnChrName: その反応が見たかったから❤
jpnSearchText: その反応が見たかったから❤

engChrName: I-I can't believe you...
engSearchText: I-I can't believe you...
jpnChrName: ！　も、もう……
jpnSearchText: ！　も、もう……

engChrName: But really, I like hearing how you got to know him.
engSearchText: But really, I like hearing how you got to know him.
jpnChrName: でもちょっと嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText: でもちょっと嬉しいです。

engChrName: He must have been so kind to you back then, huh?
engSearchText: He must have been so kind to you back then, huh?
jpnChrName: 多分……その時にヴァンさんに 凄く良くしてもらったんですよね？
jpnSearchText:
多分……その時にヴァンさんに
凄く良くしてもらったんですよね？

engChrName: How did you know?
engSearchText: How did you know?
jpnChrName: なんで……
jpnSearchText: なんで……

engChrName: Well, because you introduced me to him.
engSearchText: Well, because you introduced me to him.
jpnChrName: だからこそ私にも“紹介” してくださったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ私にも“紹介”
してくださったんでしょう？

engChrName: You're always looking out for us, Renne.
engSearchText: You're always looking out for us, Renne.
jpnChrName: 先輩がいつも私たちのことを 考えてくれているのは知っていますし。
jpnSearchText:
先輩がいつも私たちのことを
考えてくれているのは知っていますし。

engChrName: So I know you would never steer any of us in the direction of someone you didn't truly trust.
engSearchText:
So I know you would never steer any of us in the
direction of someone you didn't truly trust.
jpnChrName: よっぽど信頼に足る人じゃないと 近づけたりはしないでしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
よっぽど信頼に足る人じゃないと
近づけたりはしないでしょうから。

engChrName: Well...okay. You got me there.
engSearchText: Well...okay. You got me there.
jpnChrName: ふう……一本取られたわね。
jpnSearchText: ふう……一本取られたわね。

engChrName: He was very kind, yeah—the one who gave me the push to go from being Kitty to who I am today.
engSearchText:
He was very kind, yeah—the one who gave me the
push to go from being Kitty to who I am today.
jpnChrName: まあ、仔猫だった私が“私”になる、 最初のきっかけをくれた人ってだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、仔猫だった私が“私”になる、
最初のきっかけをくれた人ってだけよ。

engChrName: He had just started out as a spriggan, and he wasn't the most sensitive or competent...
engSearchText:
He had just started out as a spriggan, and he wasn't
the most sensitive or competent...
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋を始めたばかりで、 ぶっきらぼうで、実力も足りなくて……
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋を始めたばかりで、
ぶっきらぼうで、実力も足りなくて……

engChrName: ...but he stayed with me, struggled with me, and showed me a path to the people I love most in this world.
engSearchText:
...but he stayed with me, struggled with me, and
showed me a path to the people I love most in
this world.
jpnChrName: でも一緒になって足掻いてくれて 大切な人たちへ至る道を示してくれた。
jpnSearchText:
でも一緒になって足掻いてくれて
大切な人たちへ至る道を示してくれた。

engChrName: Wow. I had no idea...
engSearchText: Wow. I had no idea...
jpnChrName: そう、だったんですか……
jpnSearchText: そう、だったんですか……

engChrName: Heehee. I guess Van's always been Van.
engSearchText: Heehee. I guess Van's always been Van.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ヴァンさんは 昔からヴァンさんなんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ヴァンさんは
昔からヴァンさんなんですね。

engChrName: So after you met him, you were able to reunite with your loved ones?
engSearchText:
So after you met him, you were able to reunite with
your loved ones?
jpnChrName: それに先輩も…… その後、ちゃんと大切な人たちと？
jpnSearchText:
それに先輩も……
その後、ちゃんと大切な人たちと？

engChrName: That's right. And they're why I'm here now.
engSearchText: That's right. And they're why I'm here now.
jpnChrName: ええ、だから私はここにいる。
jpnSearchText: ええ、だから私はここにいる。

engChrName: They're the ones who encouraged me to study abroad, so it's thanks to them that I was able to meet all of you.
engSearchText:
They're the ones who encouraged me to study abroad,
so it's thanks to them that I was able to meet all
of you.
jpnChrName: その人たちの後押しで共和国に留学して、 貴女たちとも知り合って──
jpnSearchText:
その人たちの後押しで共和国に留学して、
貴女たちとも知り合って──

engChrName: And through some twist of fate, I accepted the position of Student Council president and am now heading up this little trip.
engSearchText:
And through some twist of fate, I accepted the
position of Student Council president and am now
heading up this little trip.
jpnChrName: 何の因果か生徒会長を引き受けて こうして視察研修も引率したりして。
jpnSearchText:
何の因果か生徒会長を引き受けて
こうして視察研修も引率したりして。

engChrName: You really never know where fate will take you.
engSearchText: You really never know where fate will take you.
jpnChrName: 不思議なものね、“縁”っていうのは。
jpnSearchText: 不思議なものね、“縁”っていうのは。

engChrName: Tell me about it.
engSearchText: Tell me about it.
jpnChrName: はい……
jpnSearchText: はい……

engChrName: Does he still obsess over sweets, by the way?
engSearchText: Does he still obsess over sweets, by the way?
jpnChrName: ああ、そういえばあの人、 甘い物好きは変わっていないの？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そういえばあの人、
甘い物好きは変わっていないの？

engChrName: I also remember him going on and on about cars...
engSearchText: I also remember him going on and on about cars...
jpnChrName: あと車にもやたら煩かったような……
jpnSearchText: あと車にもやたら煩かったような……

engChrName: Oh, boy... If anything, he's an even bigger fiend about them than he was before.
engSearchText:
Oh, boy... If anything, he's an even bigger fiend about
them than he was before.
jpnChrName: ふふ……なんだか、 昔より悪化してるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……なんだか、
昔より悪化してるみたいですね。

engChrName: At least, according to someone who knows him much better than I do, he is.
engSearchText:
At least, according to someone who knows him much
better than I do, he is.
jpnChrName: よく知る方の言葉によれば、ですけど。
jpnSearchText: よく知る方の言葉によれば、ですけど。

engChrName: Ah, the resident A-rank. Seems like they have quite the sordid relationship.
engSearchText:
Ah, the resident A-rank. Seems like they have quite
the sordid relationship.
jpnChrName: ああ、噂の“Ａ級”さんね。 何やら只ならぬ関係みたいじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、噂の“Ａ級”さんね。
何やら只ならぬ関係みたいじゃない？

engChrName: Just what exactly IS going on between them? Heehee... I know you have GOT to be curious.
engSearchText:
Just what exactly IS going on between them?
Heehee... I know you have GOT to be curious.
jpnChrName: 実際そこの所はどうなの？ うふふ、気になっているんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
実際そこの所はどうなの？
うふふ、気になっているんでしょう？

engChrName: N-Not at all... Though I, umm, might have a small idea...
engSearchText:
N-Not at all... Though I, umm, might have a
small idea...
jpnChrName: そ、そんな事は……… ………えっと、ある程度は………
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな事は………
………えっと、ある程度は………

engChrName: (Crap... It'd be weird if we woke up now. Plus I wanna hear more of what Renne has to say...)
engSearchText:
(Crap... It'd be weird if we woke up now. Plus I
wanna hear more of what Renne has to say...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、起きそびれちゃったわね。   レン先輩の話も気になるけど……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、起きそびれちゃったわね。
レン先輩の話も気になるけど……）

engChrName: (Kinda seems like Agnès needs a little boost from us, so we better do what we can to be there for her!)
engSearchText:
(Kinda seems like Agnès needs a little boost from us,
so we better do what we can to be there for her!)
jpnChrName: （なんか後れを取ったみたいだし、あたし達も   精々アニエスのバックアップをしますか……！）
jpnSearchText:
（なんか後れを取ったみたいだし、あたし達も
精々アニエスのバックアップをしますか……！）

engChrName: (Hmph. I still refuse to acknowledge that guy and his operation as legitimate.)
engSearchText:
(Hmph. I still refuse to acknowledge that guy and his
operation as legitimate.)
jpnChrName: （フン……あのバイトを   認められるわけじゃないけどな。）
jpnSearchText:
（フン……あのバイトを
認められるわけじゃないけどな。）

engChrName: (...But since we're going to the same place, I'm happy to keep an eye on her as her friend.)
engSearchText:
(...But since we're going to the same place, I'm happy
to keep an eye on her as her friend.)
jpnChrName: （……今回は同じ場所にいるんだ、   友人として目を光らせてやるさ──）
jpnSearchText:
（……今回は同じ場所にいるんだ、
友人として目を光らせてやるさ──）

engChrName: Our next stop is...Basel, Province de Auge...the terminus of this express line.
engSearchText:
Our next stop is...Basel, Province de Auge...the
terminus of this express line.
jpnChrName: ──次は終点、 オージュ州バーゼル駅です。
jpnSearchText:
──次は終点、
オージュ州バーゼル駅です。

engChrName: Please ensure you have all your belongings with you when disembarking the train.
engSearchText:
Please ensure you have all your belongings with
you when disembarking the train.
jpnChrName: どなた様もお荷物を お忘れになりませんよう……
jpnSearchText:
どなた様もお荷物を
お忘れになりませんよう……

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnSearchText: あ──

engChrName: Heehee. Finally.
engSearchText: Heehee. Finally.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ようやくね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ようやくね。

engChrName: We're gettin' close.
engSearchText: We're gettin' close.
jpnChrName: ──そろそろだな。
jpnSearchText: ──そろそろだな。

engChrName: Nice.
engSearchText: Nice.
jpnChrName: おっ……
jpnSearchText: おっ……

engChrName: That's the exit right there.
engSearchText: That's the exit right there.
jpnChrName: 出口ですね──
jpnSearchText: 出口ですね──

engChrName: Well? She's a comfy ride, right?
engSearchText: Well? She's a comfy ride, right?
jpnChrName: 改めてどうだ？　俺の愛車の乗り心地はよ。
jpnSearchText: 改めてどうだ？　俺の愛車の乗り心地はよ。

engChrName: Er... It is comfortable, yes, but I don't think now is the time to be discussing that.
engSearchText:
Er... It is comfortable, yes, but I don't think now is
the time to be discussing that.
jpnChrName: え？　まあ悪くないと思いますけど…… 今はそんな事言ってる場合じゃないですよね。
jpnSearchText:
え？　まあ悪くないと思いますけど……
今はそんな事言ってる場合じゃないですよね。

engChrName: Just hurry, please! We have to make sure that classified information doesn't fall into the wrong hands!
engSearchText:
Just hurry, please! We have to make sure that
classified information doesn't fall into the
wrong hands!
jpnChrName: いいから、もっと早く走らせてください。 絶対に機密資料を守らないと……！
jpnSearchText:
いいから、もっと早く走らせてください。
絶対に機密資料を守らないと……！

engChrName: Hmph. Yeah, yeah...
engSearchText: Hmph. Yeah, yeah...
jpnChrName: ふぅ、つれないねぇ……
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、つれないねぇ……

engChrName: Oh! I think that's the car!
engSearchText: Oh! I think that's the car!
jpnChrName: あっ──！ あそこに見える車はもしかして！
jpnSearchText:
あっ──！
あそこに見える車はもしかして！

engChrName: Looks like she's about to stop.
engSearchText: Looks like she's about to stop.
jpnChrName: ヤツは車を停めるつもりみてえだ。
jpnSearchText: ヤツは車を停めるつもりみてえだ。

engChrName: I'm gonna pull over, too, so get ready.
engSearchText: I'm gonna pull over, too, so get ready.
jpnChrName: こっちも側に車を停めるから 準備しとけよお前ら。
jpnSearchText:
こっちも側に車を停めるから
準備しとけよお前ら。
